isis.stitle: 7 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER PS110-7, PS145-7 - TROUBLESHOOTING - CLUTCH TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: CLUTCH TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: Faulty clutch operation interferes with proper shifting of gears in any transmission. The two following paragraphs describe the most common conditions encountered with clutches.
If the clutch slips or does not engage properly, first check the internal clutch adjustment. Refer to GROUP 11 - CLUTCH in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
If the clutch drags or does not release properly, check the internal clutch adjustment. Refer to GROUP 11 - CLUTCH in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
